name: player-rotate
description: Movement vector and shooting direction change periodically over time.
keywords: centrifugal force, clock, cycle, spiral, radar

name: player-reciprocate
overview: Player character moves back and forth.
description: Has automatic movement that goes back and forth within a certain range or trajectory.

name: player-reflect
overview: Reflects when colliding with walls or objects.
description: Trajectory changes through reflection behavior based on angle of incidence.

name: player-bounce
description: Rebounds on contact with ground or collision, never staying still.

name: player-automatic
description: Progresses according to terrain and rules; player cannot intervene or only indirectly.
keywords: conveyor belt, fate, flow, rail, inevitable

name: player-string
overview: Has a string-like or spring-like form.
description: Inertia and delay occur due to multiple connected segments or stretching behavior.

name: player-bar
description: Has length and rotation; collision detection changes based on angle.

name: player-circle
description: Radius can change (expand/shrink); contact range changes dynamically.

name: player-multiple
description: Control multiple entities simultaneously with a single input.

name: player-follow
description: Moves in a line, becoming a snake-like state with long collision detection.

name: player-inverted
description: Character exists on the opposite side of the screen or in a gravity-reversed world.
keywords: mirror image, dualism, polarity, upside-down, shadow

name: player-limited_vision
description: Only part of the screen is visible, or surrounded by darkness.

name: player-scaffold
description: Cannot move freely in the air; movement depends on the shape of contacted terrain.

name: player-step_on
overview: Steps on enemies or objects from above.
description: Contact from falling becomes a trigger for attacks or actions.

name: player-paint
description: Movement or action trails leave permanent changes in the environment.

name: weapon-artillery
description: Lands in an arcing trajectory rather than a straight line.
keywords: gravity, parabola, ballistics, distance sense, drop

name: weapon-chase
description: After firing, continuously corrects trajectory toward the target.

name: weapon-vertical
overview: Acts on an axis different from direction of travel.
description: Attacks or interferes with above/below or sides rather than directly ahead.
keywords: rain, pillar, axis, drop, blind spot

name: weapon-reflect
description: Uses reflection to reach places that cannot be aimed at directly.

name: weapon-auto_aiming
description: System captures optimal target regardless of player operation.

name: weapon-explosion
overview: Explodes on impact or condition fulfillment.
description: Affects an area rather than a point.

name: weapon-blow_off
description: Gives forced position movement or knockback rather than damage.

name: weapon-wipe
description: Linear or fan-shaped detection moves and covers a wide area at once.

name: weapon-arc
overview: Has an arch or fan-shaped range.
description: Deploys in a shape with trade-offs between distance and spread.

name: weapon-ray
overview: A line appears that reaches instantly.
description: No concept of bullet speed; instantly affects targets on the straight line.
keywords: flash, straight line, line of sight, penetration, speed

name: weapon-smoke
overview: Creates an effect that blocks vision.
description: Conceals information with smoke screens.

name: weapon-time_limit
overview: Effect triggers after a time delay.
description: There is lag from placement to activation; requires predicting future situations.
keywords: time bomb, countdown, panic, fuse, trap

name: weapon-disablement
description: Seals movement or attacks without destroying.

name: weapon-interference
description: Negates by hitting your action against incoming objects or enemy movements.

name: weapon-change_field
description: Rewrites field structure such as making holes or creating walls.

name: obstacle-fall
description: Objects raining down following gravity.
keywords: rain, Tetris, gravity, avalanche, falling object

name: obstacle-chase
description: Changes movement direction according to player position, closing distance.

name: obstacle-bounce
overview: Keeps bouncing off walls and floors.
description: Bounces around the field in unpredictable trajectories.

name: obstacle-split
description: Numbers increase and size decreases through destruction or time passage.
keywords: cell division, fragment, proliferation, virus, spread

name: obstacle-stack
description: Remains after falling or stopping, narrowing movement range or becoming platforms.

name: obstacle-foresee
description: Takes action toward predicted future position rather than current position.

name: obstacle-well_up
description: Appears from the ground or bottom of screen and moves upward.

name: obstacle-penalty
overview: Becomes disadvantageous on contact or destruction.
description: Objects to avoid, but often placed mixed with enemies.

name: field-floors
overview: Multiple platforms float in the air.
description: No continuous ground; platforms are placed intermittently.
keywords: island, disconnection, altitude, isolation, stepping stones

name: field-holes
description: Contains dangerous areas that cannot be traversed or cause falling.

name: field-bottomless
overview: No floor at bottom of screen.
description: Falling results in immediate game over or inability to recover.

name: field-roughness
description: Not flat; slopes and friction changes affect movement.
keywords: friction, rough road, noise, uneven, resistance

name: field-spike
overview: Dangerous zones with instant-death on contact.
description: High-risk terrain objects that result in failure just by touching.
keywords: danger, thorn, instant death, sharp, boundary

name: field-outpost
description: Goals or checkpoints with the purpose of passing or touching.

name: field-lanes
overview: Movement routes are divided into multiple lanes.
description: Not free planar movement but moving on fixed multiple lines.

name: field-pins
description: Collection of points functioning as platforms, obstacles, or hook points.

name: field-rotate
overview: The entire field or parts rotate.
description: Relative positions change as gravity direction or viewpoint rotates.

name: field-press
description: Walls or ceiling move; safe zones change or disappear over time.
keywords: claustrophobia, press machine, piston, timing, pressure

name: field-gravity
description: Characters or objects are drawn toward a specific direction or point.

name: field-space
overview: Space with sparse friction or gravity.
description: Inertia works strongly; once moving, difficult to stop.
keywords: vacuum, zero gravity, drift, vastness, inertia

name: field-water
overview: Fluid space with buoyancy or resistance.
description: Unlike air, movement has resistance or causes floating.

name: field-weather
description: Natural phenomena interfere with play through poor visibility or external forces.

name: field-connected
overview: Objects are physically connected to each other.
description: Linked by chains or rods; they move in conjunction.

name: field-regenerate
description: Revives after destruction or continues to be automatically generated.

name: field-1D
description: Only left-right or up-down movement; cannot avoid in a plane.

name: field-3D
overview: Movement or expression in depth direction exists.
description: Includes movement in Z-axis direction or perspective representation.

name: field-multiple
description: Simultaneous processing of events in different places through split screens.
keywords: multitasking, split screen, parallel, simultaneous, overview

name: field-auto_scroll
description: Standing still is not allowed; constantly pushed forward.
keywords: time, rush, conveyor, no return, anxiety

name: rule-match
description: Requires pattern recognition and selection, not just action.

name: rule-find
description: Find the correct answer or goal among many.

name: rule-classify
description: Take different responses according to attributes.

name: rule-surround
description: Create a closed shape with lines or objects.

name: rule-shelter
description: Use cover or areas that block attacks.

name: rule-pass_through_gap
description: Perform precise positioning and exploit gaps in collision detection.
keywords: eye of needle, precision, narrow path, gate, focus

name: rule-balance
description: Control to not fall over or maintain center.

name: rule-mathematics
description: Includes logical rules such as calculation, order, equations.

name: rule-physics
description: Physics simulation elements like inertia, friction, collision are core.

name: rule-geometry
description: Uses angles, symmetry, properties of figures.
keywords: angle, figure, symmetry, space, mathematical beauty

name: rule-time_limit
description: Time as a resource decreases; ends when depleted.

name: rule-gauge_management
description: Control parameter increase/decrease: store, maintain, consume.

name: rule-combo_multiplier
description: Rewards increase exponentially by continuing actions without mistakes.

name: rule-control_weapons
description: Directly move the attack means rather than the character.
keywords: remote control, puppet, indirect, drone, remote

name: rule-proximity_bonus
description: Get high scores by pushing close to collision.
keywords: daredevil, graze, risk, adrenaline, chicken race

name: rule-time_manipulation
description: Slow motion, stop, fast forward occur.

name: rule-chain
description: One action induces the next; effects propagate.

name: rule-friendly_fire
description: Your attacks also hit yourself or ally objects.
keywords: betrayal, carefulness, chaos, self-destruct, double-edged sword

name: on_pressed-turn
description: Button input changes the travel vector by 90 or 180 degrees.
keywords: turn, switch, reaction, zigzag, sharp angle

name: on_pressed-jump
description: Gain an upward vector against gravity.

name: on_pressed-flap
description: Maintain buoyancy with intermittent input, balancing with gravity.

name: on_pressed-reverse_state
description: Switch gravity, color, direction of travel to the opposite state.

name: on_pressed-shoot
description: Generate and launch an object.

name: on_pressed-pierce
description: Penetrate obstacles and interfere to the other side of the line.

name: on_pressed-split
description: One entity divides into multiple and begins behaving individually.

name: on_pressed-select_route
description: Confirm which route to take at a junction.

name: on_pressed-go_forward
description: Forward force only occurs on input.

name: on_pressed-jump_into_another
description: Leave the current host and move or possess the target.

name: on_pressed-fall
description: Cancel mid-air hang time and rush to the ground.

name: on_pressed-change_field
description: Instantly change the background or environmental rules.
keywords: world change, dimension, toggle, shift, magic

name: on_pressed-attack
description: Immediately create attack detection around self or in front.

name: on_holding-adjust_angle
description: While button is held, aim or direction of travel continues to change.

name: on_holding-rotate
description: While button is held, object performs rotational motion.

name: on_holding-thrust
description: Like a rocket, only accelerates while being pressed.

name: on_holding-move
description: Only moves while button is held.

name: on_holding-stop
description: Forcibly stop movement and fix position.

name: on_holding-shoot
description: Fire bullets intermittently or continuously while button is held.
keywords: machine gun, beam, torrent, pour, barrage

name: on_holding-extend
description: Object elongates proportional to button hold duration.

name: on_holding-charge
description: Invest time to enhance the effect of later actions.

name: on_holding-inhale
description: Generate attraction that draws surrounding objects.

name: on_holding-defend
description: Block attacks but often restricts other actions like movement.

name: on_holding-defenseless
description: Defense drops or cannot move as a trade-off for a powerful action.

name: on_holding-reverse_state
description: Only while held, become the other world or opposite attribute.
keywords: alternate, phase shift, toggle, hold, transform

name: on_holding-avoid
description: Become a state that passes through enemies or bullets.

name: on_released-throw
description: Release stored power or held object.
keywords: toss, launch, catapult, let go, throw

name: on_released-erase
description: Become a trigger to make placed items or selected range disappear.

name: on_got_item-reverse_state
description: Not power-up but rules or physics laws reverse.

name: on_got_item-power_up
description: Speed, attack power, size, etc. are enhanced.

name: on_got_item-spawn
description: Units that help the player are generated.
